lead_paragraph: The attacker who killed three military contractors at the airport in Kabul is believed to have been a member of the security forces, official said.

byline.contributor: Khalid Alokozai contributed reporting from Jalalabad, Afghanistan, and Fazal Muzhary from Kabul.

snippet: The attacker who killed three military contractors at the airport in Kabul is believed to have been a member of the security forces, official said.

headline.main: Gunman Who Killed 3 Americans Was Said to Wear Afghan Military Uniform
